message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits both of us.
Alice, my turn! I'm proposing a slightly better deal for me this time. Think carefully, the clock is ticking and the value is decreasing.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this deal before inflation eats away at your potential gains even more.
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation erodes any more of the value.
